branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - High Precision Guide
branchCategory.description: <p>Rodless cylinder, magnetically coupled series CY*H type includes a high precision guide for more precise and repeatable strokes. Magnetically coupled cylinders have a wide range of applications, and save mounting space. Loads and moments are possible through the use of integrated guides. </p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - High Precision Guide

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, CY1H, Magnetically Coupled - High Precision Guide
branchItem.description: <p>The CY1H high precision Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled uses industrial strength magnets located in the piston and external carriage to form a single unit that will travel when actuated with air pressure. It is installed with either a single axis or dual axis internal linear guides to support larger load and moment as well as greater precision than the CY1S or CY1L Series.</p>
